Sirron Norris bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe osise, onye na-ese mgbidi, na onye nkuzi nka. A maara ya màkà ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi telivishọn FOX animated Bob's Burgers na màkà ọtụtụ ihe osise ọha na eze, gụnyere ndị dị na Balmy Alley, Clarion Alley, na Mission Dolores Park, na gallery gbụrụ-gbúrụ San Francisco. Ihe osise ya na-agụnyekarị ozi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, isiokwu obodo, na akara ya na-acha anụnụ anụnụ. Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ na-enweghị uru, gụnyere SPUR na El Tecolote.
Ụlọ ọrụ na gallery Norris dị na Mission District, San Francisco.
Norris was born in Cleveland, Ohio. He is from a Black family, and has cited in interviews how living in the Midwest was a difficult experience.
Norris gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Art Institute nke Pittsburgh wee si Pittsburgh kwaga San Francisco na 1997.

Norris malitere ise ihe osise na 1999 dị ka ụzọ isi kpọsaa ọrụ ya. Ihe osise mbụ ya dị n'èzí ụlọ ahịa dị n'akụkụ 20th na Bryant Street. Tupu nke a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na ndị na-ese ihe nkírí egwuregwu vidio ma ọ nweghị ọzụzụ ọ bụla na eserese murals.
Norris mepụtara ihe ngosi màkà San Francisco Public Library Summer Read SF program na 2012.
N'afọ 2000, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na De Young Museum
N'afọ 2002, ọ bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na Yerba Buena Center for the Arts. N'afọ 2005, ọ nọrọ ọnwa atọ dị ka onye na-ese ihe na Recology.
N'afọ 2017, ọ natara "Greater Bay Area Journalism Award" màkà "Kaepernick" na El Tecolote, akụkụ nke usoro ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na-aga n'ihu nkè akpọrọ "Cityfruit".
